column5: I fished Saturday with my Dad for Gar with the fly rods. We saw hundreds gulping air early in the day but with the storm and cool night they were hanging deep and not laying in the shallows until later in the day. They final moved up but by then boat traffic was crazy stirring up the shoreline and making things really difficult. Managed to land one an dad and I both lost a few more. I really wish we got the big ones like the East end of the Lake but they are still fun to change things up a bit
Wish I had waters up here to catch some of them.  Well done.
Nice catch!  What fly do you use to target them?
